comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110214 Firefox/4.0b12pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110214 Firefox/4.0b12pre

Split menus should display sub-menu on a slightly delayed hover



Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: dk.holmes@gmail.com
comments.author: dk.holmes@gmail.com
margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Are you reporting this bug about the edit sub-menu in particular? That menu is actually implemented as a menu, not a split menu (bug 590744).

The delay was actually already implemented for the rest of the normal split menus in bug 589146.
